body:
### Expected Result

Successful concretization of python packages 

### Actual Result

```
[sajid@apsxrmd-0001 ~]$ spack spec -I py-matplotlib
Input spec
--------------------------------
     py-matplotlib

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: py-matplotlib does not depend on py-functools32 or py-subprocess32
```
This works fine if I give ```^python@3.6.5``` as an additional argument.

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. linux-centos7-x86_64
 2. python preferred version set to 3.6.5 in packages.yaml
title: concretization error for python3
